  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15208</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Premi Nobel per la Fisica -  Alcuni vincitori Europei</string>
            <string language="en">Nobel Prize in Physics - Some European Winners</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nobelpreis in der Physik - einige europäische 
Sieger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Prix Nobel dans la physique - quelques gagnants 
européens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Prêmio de nobel na física - alguns vencedores 
europeus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βραβείο Νόμπελ στη φυσική - μερικοί ευρωπαϊκοί 
νικητές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Premio Nobel en la física - algunos ganadores 
europeos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO suggerisce una dimensione culturale dell'insegnamento/apprendimento della scienza e della tecnologia attraverso lo studio di numerosi contributi resi da scienziati ed inventori di diversi paesi Europei. Si impareranno anche differenti concetti scientifici e tecnologici e scoperte praticando la lettura della lingua inglese. </string>
            <string language="en">This LO suggests teaching/learning science and technology intercultural dimension through the study of several contributions made by scientists from different European countries. They will also learn different scientific and technological concepts and artefacts while practicing English reading.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses NIEDRIGE schlägt teaching/learning 
Wissenschaft und interkulturelles Maß der Technologie durch die 
Studie einiger Beiträge vor, die von den Wissenschaftlern von den 
unterschiedlichen europäischen Ländern gebildet werden. Sie 
erlernen auch unterschiedliche wissenschaftlichen und technologischen 
Konzepte und die Kunstprodukte beim Üben des englischen Messwertes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce BAS suggère la science de teaching/learning 
et la dimension interculturelle de technologie par l'étude de 
plusieurs contributions apportées par des scientifiques à partir de 
différents pays européens. Ils apprendront également 
différents concepts et objets façonnés scientifiques et 
technologiques tout en pratiquant la lecture anglaise.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este BAIXO sugere a ciência de teaching/learning
e a dimensão intercultural da tecnologia com o estudo de diversas 
contribuições feitas por cientistas dos países europeus diferentes.
Aprenderão também conceitos diferentes e artefacts 
científicos e technological ao praticar a leitura inglesa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το LO προτείνει/επιστήμη και τεχνολογία 
εκμάθησης διαπολιτισμική διάσταση μέσω της μελέτης διάφορων 
συνεισφορών που γίνονται από τους επιστήμονες από τις 
διαφορετικές ευρωπαϊκές χώρες. Θα μάθουν επίσης τις 
διαφορετικά επιστημονικά και τεχνολογικά έννοιες και τα 
χειροποίητα αντικείμενα εν ενεργεία την αγγλική ανάγνωση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este BAJO sugiere ciencia de teaching/learning y 
la dimensión intercultural de la tecnología con el estudio de varias
contribuciones hechas por los científicos de diversos países 
europeos. También aprenderán diversos conceptos y los 
artefactos científicos y tecnológicos mientras que practican la 
lectura inglesa.</string>
          </description>
        </general>

        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>higher education</value>
          </context>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>continuing education</value>
          </context>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">U-U</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO può essere usato in differenti contesti secondo l'età degli studenti e la loro conoscenza della lingua inglese. Questa lezione richiede circa tre ore. 1. Gli studenti lavorano in gruppi di 2-3. Esaminano tutto il quiz e cercano di rispondere alle domande. In caso di dubbio, possono usare il sito suggerito come fonte di informazioni sugli  scienziati Europei e i loro contributi alla scienza e alla tecnologia. 2. Gli studenti valutano i loro risultati cognitivi facendo il quiz. 3. Basandosi sul sito suggerito, ogni gruppo di studenti può preparare un documento su uno scienziato ( vita e scoperte) di un diverso paese, che sarà condiviso con la classe.</string>
            <string language="en">This LO can be used in different settings accordingly with students’ age and knowledge of English. This lesson takes about 3 hours.
1. Students work in groups of 2-3. They go through the quiz and try to answer the questions. In case of any doubt, they can use the suggested site as a source of information about European scientists and their contributions to science.
2. Students evaluate their learning results by doing the quiz.
3. Based on the suggested site, each group of students can prepare a paper, on a scientist (her/his life and work) from a different country, that will be shared with the class.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
